Texts.Chs:
第九条，第三项。
被驱逐者
被驱逐者不再被允许进入绘世者领地，只有非常崇高的行为才能让他们重回绘世者居住的星系。为了重拾荣誉，一位被驱逐者首先需要通过行动证明他的意图。如果他的行为被认为是崇高的，他将重获绘世者公民身份，并再次自由地与他的同类一起生活。
Texts.Eng:
Article 9, Paragraph 3.
Outcasts

Outcasts are not allowed to enter Skath Territory anymore and only greatly honourable acts will allow them to enter Skath inhabited star systems. To regain his honour, an outcast needs to prove his intentions through action first. If his act is deemed honourable he shall regain his Skath citizenship and is freely allowed to live around his kind again.

Texts.Chs: 如果被驱逐者未能重获认可，他必须在一天之内离开绘世者所在区域，否则将被处决。如果没有证人的口头协议，监管者没有义务让这些被驱逐者存活，因为他们已经放弃了自己的荣誉。
Texts.Eng: Should the outcast fail, he must leave Skath space within 1 day or be executed. Officers are under no obligation to keep such Outcasts alive if a verbal agreement is not ratified by a witness, for they have forsaken their honour.
